name: Glutaryl-CoA:dihydrolipoamide S-succinyltransferase
definition: Glutaryl-CoA + Enzyme N6-(dihydrolipoyl)lysine <=> CoA + [Dihydrolipoyllysine-residue succinyltransferase] S-glutaryldihydrolipoyllysine
comment: 2-oxoglutarate dehydrogenase complex:dihydrolipoyllysine-residue succinyltransferase a part of multi-step reaction (see R01933, R01940+R02571+R07618) following after R01940
